entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
